name: Void: Edge of Existence
description:
Take part in the Epic Adventure of Andral as he overcomes multiple Trials within the Edge of his own Existence to Reclaim his Soul.

Void: Edge of Existence Is a Single Player Trial Based RPG, Following the Story of Andral and undertaking the trials the await him in order to reclaim his soul and seek out the Retribution from his own Betrayal.

Key Features:

- Narrative Driven Storyline
As a Sentinel of Arronia, Andral Duty is To Settle and Resolve Conflicts within the Empire. Following the Battle of Shal'Darah Andral was Betrayed by an Unlikely Foe and has found himself within the Realm of Xeross. Undertaking the Trials of Reforging his Soul you must complete the Trials of the Soul to Forge it whole and gain the Retribution he seeks.

- Level Scaling progression
Void's progression system is one of simplicity, For every time the game has been completed the Level State will increase (+1) and with every NEW run through of Void will scale all Bosses, Trash Mobs by this, while also unlocking Items after a certain Level has been achieved.

- In-Game Collections and Hidden Items
There are Multiple Items with Unique Effect within Void, some of which can adjust your Base Stats (Health, Essence, Regen, Movement Speed, Etc..). While others can effect your game play all together.

Some Items can be obtained through Defeating Bosses on Drop Chance, others through Secret Combinations of Existing Items, with the base sets found throughout and other Levels.

Note: Items Scale With Level making your Build of Items much more impactful in Higher Level States.

- Player Controlled Skill Power
The Player Has Full Control of there own Skill Power Adapting there Base, Higher and Ability Stats as they wish. This Can be Changed After or Before each Trial so you can Adapt your Character Before Facing Each Boss ( Trial ) you are to Overcome.

Increasing you Skill Power can be traded with "Soul Fragments" and or "Soul Shards" at a 1 Whole Fragment equaling in 1 Point conversion into a given Stat.

Key Bindings:

- Movement Controls: [W], [A], [S], [D]
- Camera: [Mouse] ( Plus Scroll Wheel To Zoom In and Out )
- Abilities: [1], [2], [3], [4], [5]
- Inventory: B
- Skill Power: [P]
- Interaction / Saving: [F], [X]
